SaiyanBlood.NAME: Saiyan Blood
SaiyanBlood.FLAVOR: Saiyan blood courses through your veins
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 4 Ki Regen at start of battle.
When a debuff applied to you expires gain NL 1 MaxHP and 3 TempHP up to 3 times per battle.
Gain 4 Ki Regen at start of battle. Max 3x per battle, grow when a debuff expires.

SaiyanHeart.NAME: Saiyan Heart
SaiyanHeart.FLAVOR: Your Saiyan Heart thirsts for battle.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a debuff applied to you expires gain 1 MaxHP and 3 TempHP up to 3 times per battle.
